Creator: Kpginog, A.B., artist
Description: Poster showing two scenes. First, the world being grabbed by Kaiser Wilhelm II, hoisted by Emperor Franz Josef of Austria and Ottoman Sultan Mehmed V Reşad. Next, the same three figures skewered on a lance by Russia.
